description: The pinnacle of automotive engineering. A 900-horsepower hybrid hypercar with a carbon fiber monocoque, active aerodynamics, and a powertrain that rewrites the laws of physics. There are twelve in existence. One is in Nova Pacifica. And now it's yours.
lore: Nova Motors built twelve hypercars as a technology demonstrator and sold each one for nearly a million dollars. The hybrid powertrain combines a twin-turbo V8 with three electric motors, producing 900 horsepower and instant torque. Active aerodynamics adjust the car's downforce profile in real-time.
